The number of ICMP Echo Reply messages received. 收到的ICMP回显回复消息数。

item.name: 该设备的所有网络接口数量总和（包括没启用的接口）
item.description: The number of network interfaces (regardless of their current state) present on this system.

item.name: (从接口接收的输入数据报的总数，包括错误接收的数据报。)The total number of input datagrams received from interfaces, including those received in error.
item.description: The total number of input datagrams received from interfaces, including those received in error.

item.name: 成功传递到IP用户协议（包括ICMP）的输入数据报总数。
item.description: The total number of input datagrams successfully delivered to IP user-protocols (including ICMP).

item.name: Time-To-Live
TCP连接从关闭状态直接转换到SYN-SENT状态的次数。The number of times TCP connections have made a direct transition to the SYN-SENT state from the CLOSED state
item.description: The number of times TCP connections have made a direct transition to the SYN-SENT state from the CLOSED state. TCP连接从关闭状态直接转换到SYN-SENT状态的次数。

item.name: 当前状态为“已建立”或“关闭等待”的TCP连接数。The number of TCP connections for which the current state is either ESTABLISHED or CLOSE-WAIT.
item.description: 当前状态为“已建立”或“关闭等待”的TCP连接数。The number of TCP connections for which the current state is either ESTABLISHED or CLOSE-WAIT.

item.name: TCP连接从“已建立”状态或“关闭等待”状态直接转换为“关闭”状态的次数。The number of times TCP connections have made a direct transition to the CLOSED state from either the ESTABLISHED state or the CLOSE-WAIT state.
item.description: The number of times TCP connections have made a direct transition to the CLOSED state from either the ESTABLISHED state or the CLOSE-WAIT state. TCP连接从“已建立”状态或“关闭等待”状态直接转换为“关闭”状态的次数。

item.name: TCP连接从侦听状态直接转换到SYN-RCVD状态的次数。The number of times TCP connections have made a direct transition to the SYN-RCVD state from the LISTEN state.
item.description: The number of times TCP connections have made a direct transition to the SYN-RCVD state from the LISTEN state. TCP连接从侦听状态直接转换到SYN-RCVD状态的次数。
